subject: Shipping inquiry
description_text:
Hello Simsonn,

I am living in Bulgaria and I want to make an order from your website for
the Plus X pedals set.

My question is: Will the pedals be sent from your European warehouse and
thus prevent any import taxes?

Kind regards,
Tihomir Yakovov

conversations.body_text: Hi Tihomir Yakovov,  Yes, for orders within the EU, the PlusX may be shipped from Germany. You can also add a note to your order requesting shipment from Germany.Â
